name: Brent Knudsen
title: Founder & Managing Partner
description: Brent is an avid athlete and lover of the outdoors having competed in skiing, swimming, tennis, bike racing, distance running and triathlons with a personal best marathon of 2:40 (NY 1982) and personal best Ironman of 9:58 (Canada 1989). Brent’s favorite passion is time with his three children, five grandchildren, and beautiful wife of over 35 years.

name: Vern Christensen
title: Managing Director
description: Vern has always enjoyed sports and outdoor activities. Growing up on a farm he learned valuable lessons about hard work and making things grow. Most importantly, he learned that you need to work as hard as you play, a philosophy he still treasures. Today he enjoys skiing, hiking, fishing and camping with his children and grandchildren. He lives in Salt Lake City with his wife of over 40 years, conveniently close to many great outdoor activities.

name: Webb Knudsen
title: Vice President
description: Webb has a multifaceted background in entertainment, social media, and mobile working across sales, business development, and marketing capacities to drive profitability and optimize market strategy for movies, brands, and apps. He graduated from Pepperdine with a dual major in Sociology and Speech Communication.

name: Suise Lecker
title: Advisor
description: Canadian by birth, Susie is “living the dream” in Southern California with a view of the ocean. Susie has a deep love of travel - and curiosity about different cultures. To that end - she has visited all but one of the world’s continents. Aside from travel, Susie meditates daily, loves the beach, pilates, hiking, and spending time with her dog.

name: Hiren Modi
title: Fund Finance
description: Hiren is a Chartered Accountant and CPA who is passionate about people and numbers. He brings expertise in various facets of audit, taxation and accounting. He grew up in a small town, imbibing the qualities of persistence and hard work. He is a passionate leader and an inspirational speaker. He lives in San Francisco and enjoys spending time with his wife and daughters.

name: Jason Winship
title: Advisor
description: A lifelong athlete, Jason was a four year varsity football letterman and an academic all American at Rice. These days, he enjoys surfing, skiing and taking his dog for runs in the beautiful outdoor places of Northern California that he, his wife Annie, and their three children call home.

name: Ben Weinberger
title: Advisor
description: Ben thrives on travel and new adventures with his wife and daughter. Whether they are skiing, exploring mountain trails with their dog, avidly watching college basketball or enjoying the beach, Ben and family frequently are making memories together. Ben also takes on home renovation projects and is passionate about a variety of facets within the real estate industry.

name: Nicholai Christensen
title: Analyst
description: Nicholai is a parent to three wonderful children who are a source inspiration and motivation. Outside of professional and family life, Nicholai is a board game enthusiast, regularly organizing game nights with friends and family. This hobby not only provides a fun and competitive outlet but also fosters a sense of community and strategic thinking.

name: Michael Sala
title: Advisor
description: Michael seeks creative inspiration from everywhere including his love of travelling, taking photos while exploring cities or discovering something inspiring while simply out for a walk or hike. Michael and his wife Noriko lived in NYC and now sunny LA where they enjoy design, art & are passionate foodies. Michael loves trying new things & being surrounded by smart & creative thinkers.

name: Vicki Wiget
title: Executive Assistant
description: Raised in Chico, California, Vicki attended CSU Chico - then lived in the Santa Cruz area for many years where she raised her family and assisted her husband in his work. She has lived in Los Gatos for over 10 years. Vicki has a deep love of the outdoors.  She enjoys fishing like her dad taught her, hiking, and visiting warm places where she can snorkel. She is committed to working out at a gym to help her stay healthy.
